amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2020, LB387, § 49. Operative date January 1, 2021. Petit jury; how notified.
amendatorysection.para: The jury commissioner shall immediately after the selection, referred to in sections 25-1641 and 25-1642, mail a juror qualification form to each proposed juror pursuant to section 25-1629.01.
